forecast.name: Labor Day
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 74, with temperatures falling to around 72 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 8 to 17 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 58. West southwest wind 10 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the day unfolds under a clear blue sky, embracing the city with a gentle warmth as the sun climbs higher. With a high near 74 degrees, the air feels pleasingly mild, while a light breeze from the west southwest, fluctuating between 8 to 17 mph, adds a refreshing touch to the afternoon tranquility. As daylight transitions into evening, temperatures will settle into the comfortable embrace of around 58 degrees, inviting a cozy yet casual style.

The iconic views, unshrouded by fog, reveal the Golden Gate Bridge shimmering in the distance, framed by the embrace of twilight’s radiant hues. This clarity offers an ideal backdrop for leisurely strolls along the waterfront or perhaps a visit to one of the city's many inviting cafés, where one can savor the richness of local brews while absorbing the vibrant energy of urban life. Comfortable layers, perhaps a light jacket, would suffice as twilight approaches, allowing one to enjoy the soft whisper of the evening breeze. It's a day steeped in simplicity, perfect for letting the city unfold at a relaxed pace, amidst the lingering charm of summer.
